website_summaries.verdict: The optimal choice if you are looking for a classic computer desk.
pros: Much more of a traditional look, which should appeal to those who need something that blends in with classic furniture
cons: Doesn't have a huge working area, although the desktop space is freed up by the nicely concealed keyboard shelf

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and heavy piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it. Goes great with the décor of my home which is country cabin. Awesome color. Directions to put it together were easy to follow. I assembled it by myself. Once assembled it is heavy and sturdy which is a plus. I had to wait for my husband to get home from work to help me stand it upright.
customer_reviews.author: Denise D.

customer_reviews.title: Challenging to put together
customer_reviews.text: This computer desk was challenging to put together. The material quality was poor. We weren't sure that it would hold up but seemed to become more sturdy when upright. I gave this 4 stars because it really looks nice once it is completed. During the assembly process there were times when we thought it may need to be returned because the particle board came apart. Everything turned out ok in the end but you may want to be aware of these problems.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Good and solid.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 6th unit from Sauder. I have been impressed. Yes, this is not solid wood furniture - but for the price I feel these look good and seem solid. Becoming an installation pro, so now don't seem to find these an issue to put together as I did in the beginning. Noticed they even put in some humorous comments in the instructions - I think just to see if we are looking! Good for Sauder's though... brought a smile to an otherwise boring task. Once assembled I was happy with the look and seemed solid enough for the kids.
customer_reviews.author: looneymoose

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were clear and had a few pages with comical remarks that were entertaining. It took my husband and I about an hour to put together. It is quite sturdy, although it's not solid wood so its's not going to be the same kind of sturdy. We use it as a computer desk and place to do homework and we are totally satisfied!!! Highly recommend for a dorm, college apartment, kids/teen room or homework space as a good looking desk with a great price tag!
customer_reviews.author: BrazingtonBlurb

customer_reviews.title: Very nice small desk with hutch
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size for my computer and printer and also has the hutch to place decorations or framed photos of the grandkids! So far it appears to be sturdy. I like the drawer spot for the keyboard and mouse so that it can be slid in and hidden when closed. My only concern with that part would be someone putting too much weight on it by leaning on and breaking it. The color was also perfect for me and it has nice drawer hardware. I have had many compliments on it and am very satisfied with it - time will tell!
customer_reviews.author: Carol P.

customer_reviews.title: All good quality hardware with accurate counts
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually write reviews because of time restraints, but this product really impressed me. Received on time in well protected packaging. The instructions were in correct English language (nice for a change) with clear illustrations.The thing that really impressed me was the quality of materials and the attention to detail in the machining accuracy. Went together perfectly! All good quality hardware with accurate counts. Also, the price was surprisingly reasonable. Great product. This company is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Desk
customer_reviews.text: Awesome desk/workstation - we bought 2 of them and had both of them assembled in less than 3 hours. We bought these for our 12 and 13 year old children. Assembly was so easy that my kids were able to put each of their own desks together with supervision. The assembly was intuitive as well, you start with the top and work your way down to a very sturdy desk. The fasteners were also very nice, these desks won't be coming apart any time soon!
customer_reviews.author: EC

customer_reviews.title: It makes a wonderful work station
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my kids and they wanted them back to back. It makes a wonderful work station. The ease of assembly is notable. Clear, labeled instructions, pieces are hardware. Take about ten minutes and sort the hardware before you begin. It will save you a lot of time. I built two of these by myself in about 3 hours. I would definitely buy this again. It's only been a few weeks but they are holding up great with two teenage boys, who are rough on everything.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle W

customer_reviews.title: Nice desk for price
customer_reviews.text: Nice desk but a little smaller than I expected not necessarily width but could have been a little deeper. The color is also nice. I recommend this size for kids or college students. If you are an adult and need it as an office desk I recommend one a little bigger but you will have to pay $75 more. I miss the good old fashion real all wood desks.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica K

customer_reviews.title: Cant move around once put together
customer_reviews.text: The Desk looks nice but is very flimsy. the top shelf bowed after only a few weeks with light weight items on top. Where you put it together is where you need to put it. I tried to move it and it started coming apart which is frustrating but I guess with this kind of synthetic material that's to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Allen

customer_reviews.title: Good but...
customer_reviews.text: The product itself looks great. Assembly was lengthy (I did it by myself though and messed up a few times). Finished product feels sturdy. Only reason im not giving it 5 stars is because my package was missing the rollers for the keyboard tray. I contacted the manufacturer and got them within 3 days. So do recommend but definitely contact them if you're missing anything .
customer_reviews.author: Pita

customer_reviews.title: It was no trouble to put together and I've slid it side to side a little many times and it's as sturdy as desk like this can get
customer_reviews.text: I just needed a regular simple desk, and this works well. It was no trouble to put together and I've slid it side to side a little many times and it's as sturdy as desk like this can get. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Looks pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: Love the size. Looks good. Built cheap but sturdy, wouldn't expect it to survive a lot of moving while assembled though because it is particle board. I can tell it's cheap particle board when I'm looking for it. Liked that I could get shelves to match cheaply.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hercules

customer_reviews.title: Great desk
customer_reviews.text: This desk is out third Sauder brand piece of furniture. I am pleased with all of them. The price is very reasonable. The look is really high end. The instructions were easy to follow and assembly went smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT PIERSON

customer_reviews.title: ***three stars read more.
customer_reviews.text: For starters it was four days late shipping to my house.. When I received it the whole box was busted open all down the one side. Only the plastic was holding it together... When I opened the box all the pieces where unharmed besides one piece was cracked my guess is due to the box being busted open... I'm still giving it three stars due to the fact it looks great after putting it together and it's a sturdy desk... It took me only three hours to the min. to put together by myself...
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, beautiful color desk!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, beautiful color desk. It’s a small to medium sized desk. Only enough space to hold my 27” Mac monitor and small printer, that’s it! Wasn’t too, too bad to put together, although you will need 2 people to do so. Yes, I would recommend this to someone looking for a small to mid sized desk for a small compact area.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: did not get what was in the picture
customer_reviews.text: we did not receive the item that is in the picture. i really loved the look of the desk in the picture and was looking forward to setting it up. but when we got it, which was on time, it was a typical, oak finish, boring. hard drive closet is on the opposite side then what is shown in the picture, plus side is the desk we got has an extra drawer. i didn't want to take the time to return it. i just decided to keep it. it was just too big to take it back.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Ali

customer_reviews.title: Great little desk for the money
customer_reviews.text: Nice little desk. Read the dimensions. It is kind of small. Good if you don't have room for a bigger one. Two nice shelves on top. I have a 32 inch tv as a monitor and it fits in it. Easy to follow instructions to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: dvdmaniac

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy and arrived with marks.
customer_reviews.text: This is not as sturdy as my previous purchases from this brand. Some of the fasteners did not lock correctly. One of the pre-drilled holes was broken open. I had to be creative to get that area secure. There was a scuff on the drawer. Overall I was not happy, but once you get it together it is tough to return. I would not buy this model again.
customer_reviews.author: SB86

customer_reviews.title: Good instructions... back is not wood
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are well written and desk is sturdy. I don't like that the back is not wood, it's just a faux wood panel. It still looks nice though.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Broke in a few months
customer_reviews.text: Broke when we moved it a little. The entire desk/ hutch fell apart. Had taken so long to assemble, having to throw it in a couple months.
customer_reviews.author: Ambica Bakshi

customer_reviews.title: Good deal.
customer_reviews.text: Box was super heavy, took me about 4 hours to assemble, by myself. I just wish the flimsy backing piece, was thicker and had no cut outs. Other than that, was a good deal, and looks nice, I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the assembly
customer_reviews.text: Hard to assemble, not very sturdy. I would return it but I don't want the hassle of taking it apart. It's basically wood printed paper over presswood.
customer_reviews.author: miii

customer_reviews.title: We absolutely Love this desk with it's spaciousness but not too big ...
customer_reviews.text: This desk was delivered as promised with no problems. It took my husband more than 2 hours to put together with the instructions mostly clear. We absolutely Love this desk with it's spaciousness but not too big for the space allowed. The slide out keyboard is nice and able to push it back in to stow away. I highly recommend this desk for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Sue J

customer_reviews.title: Great Assembly Instructions
customer_reviews.text: This is a great desk for the price. The instructions were incredibly simple to follow and all the parts lined up correctly. I would buy furniture from Sauder again.
customer_reviews.author: David Chumley

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece of furniture for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Good looking product. Instructions were very good. It took me longer to assemble than I thought it would take & an extra set of hands at times helps.
customer_reviews.author: RadioDaveAz

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality for the price and it looks great
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality for the price and it looks great! Super easy and clear how to assemble - turns out to be even fun to do it! Highly recommend this desk for thoughtful design and quality!
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality computer table
customer_reviews.text: Came on time in a small box, it took almost an hour to assemble. All parts were provided with step by step instruction. However it could be better if assembly could be improved a bit more.
customer_reviews.author: ShuklaYash

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what i wanted
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my husbands gameing days. Good amount of room and beautiful color
customer_reviews.author: Tristen Rector

customer_reviews.title: Great decor.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these and I'm very happy that I did. The desks are beautiful and very sturdy and looks very well in my computer room.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Bruster

customer_reviews.title: Average quality and very hard to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: The table is not the best of computer tables for the price.It is flimsy despite having so many cam screws and also is very time consuming to assemble. If you are doing it by yourself alone it will take you atleast 4-5 hours to assemble it and then the quality of material is at the best average and had chips and dents on it already when taken out of the package. Would rather buy from IKEA than Sauder.
customer_reviews.author: kandyman109

customer_reviews.title: Great desk
customer_reviews.text: Arrived just as described. Directions were easy and it took about 2 hours to put together. Hardware and materials were good quality and fit together nicely.
customer_reviews.author: NickD

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: It’s very durable and not too terrible to set up. Trust me It looks daunting when you see this huge heavy box full of wood, but when it’s all said and done this is a great desk!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice desk
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my mom's computer. It is very nice. It took me about 3 and a 1/2 hours to assemble, but the directions were very easy to read and the holes all lined up perfectly. It just has a lot of pieces. I would recommend it. It seems like it will last. My mom was very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Ksb

customer_reviews.title: Just what was needed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for my grandson and family. They are very please with the desk/hutch. It now gives them a place to be comfortable doing homework and home paper work. The color is just right.
customer_reviews.author: Ginny

customer_reviews.title: Worth the weight
customer_reviews.text: Awesome desk! Very sturdy and durable! Requires a person who knows about assembling because there were a lot of pieces. Also box was very heavy 100 pounds so will need someone to carry it. The shipping of the box took a lot longer than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice desk!
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy, sturdy desk for the money. Some difficulty putting it together, took 5-6 hrs but when finished it’s perfect size and looks great in my sons room!
customer_reviews.author: Casey Sivert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not too hard to put together and very nice looking. Pretty sturdy too.
customer_reviews.author: Latesha Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Desk
customer_reviews.text: I was liking for a smaller desk than we.had. I order this one. My husband built it with no problem. It loOKs great too.
customer_reviews.author: Paulald41

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, thought it would be a little lighter in color though
customer_reviews.author: Micah Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Very affordable, good looking, well-made computer desk.
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product. Very affordable. Sturdy and looks very nice put together. All hardware and parts were well marked for assembly. Hardware well made. Have had many positive comments from family & friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a birthday gift. It was very time consuming to put together, but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice size, however a little bit cheap looking. But you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Stephens

customer_reviews.title: I am absolutely happy with my new desk!
customer_reviews.text: I must admit I was skeptical at first because I was worried the color of the desk wouldn't match my décor. But its perfect! Very happy with this desk its beautiful. I would definitely recommend to a friend!
customer_reviews.author: Katina Snow

customer_reviews.title: Overall good purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this computer desk. I wanted a little workspace area, nothing huge since I have limited space and this was perfect! The price is nice, and I’d say it’s pretty sturdy! I have enough room to work on it. The color is really pretty too.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Its a great fit for my home office
customer_reviews.text: Its a great fit for my home office. I have to say- there are times where another person would be a HUGE benefit to assist with assembly. It took about three hours to get it all together. It had been time consuming finding a screw that is needed in one bag of SEVERAL other screw sizes, nails.... and twice I did not have the screw(s) that I was suppose to have
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, and was able to put together myself
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, and was able to put together myself. It was easy to put together, but I will warn that it's not one of those desks you can move around easily without breaking apart so be mindful of that.
customer_reviews.author: S. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Getting Some Work Done!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful addition to my newly remodeled office/workroom. High functional with nice look and feel. Makes you want to sit down and be more production everyday. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: OfGentry

customer_reviews.title: If you're looking for a small computer desk,  this is the one to purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Great piece of furniture. Perfect for the space! Looks just like the advertisement!
customer_reviews.author: Shorty

customer_reviews.title: What you expect for the price.
customer_reviews.text: What you expect for the price. Took me forever to put it together. Desk is chip board with wood lament over it. It is pretty sturdy once put together.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia McHugh

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great! I love this desk and it's nice and strong.
customer_reviews.author: mw

customer_reviews.title: Now that desk is smooth!
customer_reviews.text: Came out to be lovely setup took 3 hours but that isn't bad. Everything was smooth although I did break the back piece of the desktop case but thats cause I wanted it and no door because my computer is a full tower.
customer_reviews.author: Alex E.

customer_reviews.title: No Desk Drawer but Still a Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Pretty awesome piece. I just wish it showed clearly that it was a keyboard cubby and not a drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to build and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I love the finished result! It was easy enough to build and is sturdy. I'm a college student and this is the perfect study area with storage. It took me sbout 4-5 hours to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Did not have the instructions in the box and six of the pieces did not have the letter.
customer_reviews.author: SHIRLEY  HOLMES

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, but assembly takes a long time!
customer_reviews.text: Dresser looks great! The only downfall was the assembly which took over 3 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: The cost / benefit ratio is very good
customer_reviews.text: Very good choice. The cost / benefit ratio is very good. I'm happy with this desk. It satisfies 100% my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Augusto Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty, and the perfect size for the space I have. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: lady917

customer_reviews.title: Awesome desk!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome just took forever to build /: but it’s small and just what I was looking for !(:
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: size
customer_reviews.text: could be a little bigger but for the room i have fits great.
customer_reviews.author: bracson

customer_reviews.title: Great desk for the price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, good quality. Not real wood (it's compressed) but not expecting that for this price. So far no complaints; it's a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Instructions are very easy to follow but ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Instructions are very easy to follow but still time consuming. Plan on 2-3 hours and will require 2 people for the last few steps. Again, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kipper3663

customer_reviews.title: A alsome desk
customer_reviews.text: We give this desk a 5 out of 5 is is very sterdy. We LOVE it
customer_reviews.author: Courtney smith

customer_reviews.title: Takes hours and hours to put together and the directions are confusing
customer_reviews.text: The absolute worst and hardest product to put together...heavy and yet flimsy
customer_reviews.author: Monique Lewin Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great value, nice quality.
customer_reviews.text: A bit of project to assemble, but the results are worth it. Plan to spend an afternoon. Lay out all the pieces and and read the directions all the way through before beginning assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Bert

customer_reviews.title: Nice desk
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product. nothing fancy but is easy to put together & looks decent.
customer_reviews.author: Lady VM

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to replace part broken part
customer_reviews.text: I had to throw my desk in the dumpster. $169.00 wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I'm quite pleased with the purchase i made for this desk. It arrived much earlier than expected and me and my wife put it together in about an hour and a half.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: I recommend
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, clear instructions, sturdy, great buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Charity M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice desk
customer_reviews.text: As described, sold desk for an average person to enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Glazier

customer_reviews.title: I just love it. Got here a day earlier than expected
customer_reviews.text: It's gorgeous! I just love it. Got here a day earlier than expected.
customer_reviews.author: CrystalK

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Nice desk. Small, yet roomy. Fits in a tight space that we have. Assembly was good. For the $$, it is a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy W.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, excellent price
customer_reviews.text: The desk is a nice looking piece of furniture, it serves all my purposes very well. Assembling it took my friend and me about 4 hours and at times the instructions were confusing but we got it done and I'm very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte LaBar

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift for son
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my son it was a good price so I feared it would look cheep, it turned out to be a good lookin unit my son was very pleased with it
customer_reviews.author: Bruce C. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Computer Desk
customer_reviews.text: I choose this item because of the look of it and the color! When I received it I loved everything about it! The size was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Moore

customer_reviews.title: The furniture took a good 5 hours to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The furniture took a good 5 hours to assemble, but the worst part is that the front drawer underneath the tabletop isn't a drawer at all...it's slide out platform for your keyboard. IMHO, that's pretty damn deceptive and it should be noted in BOLD so that buyers know exactly what they are getting. It's typical particle board furniture, not bad but definitely disposable furniture.
customer_reviews.author: tetsuojin

customer_reviews.title: Great furniture piece!
customer_reviews.text: I used it as a mini kitchen area for my kids playroom. I put a mini fridge under it that fit perfect, a microwave on the desk, and candy jars on the hutch. Looks great and the kids love it. I put it together by myself and it took about 5 hours.
customer_reviews.author: AMeadors

customer_reviews.title: very happy I bought this desk
customer_reviews.text: very happy I bought this desk. Nice price and color. It did take us 3 hours to put together but the directions were easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great desk
customer_reviews.text: The desk was exactly as advertised. Another plus...the kit was complete down to the last screw. We put it together in 2 1/2 hours with almost no swearing!
customer_reviews.author: GRAMMIE B

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for when you buy a ...
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for when you buy a desk for $150. Cheap particle board that barely fits together.
customer_reviews.author: A. Watts

customer_reviews.title: It fits!
customer_reviews.text: It's a birthday present for my son and it just fits our space. I searched online for quite a while and this one fits our room perfectly! The desk looks steady and feels good. The only negative point is probably the color - it's darker than that in the picture and so is a little out of sync with the other furnitures. Putting it in a bright spot helps.
customer_reviews.author: BusyParentsOf3

customer_reviews.title: Looks great. Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Well designed and well made. Instructions were spot on and it took about three hours to assemble with a couple of breaks added in. Looks great. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Roland F

customer_reviews.title: Fair - gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it is ok. The actual color is slightly dull than the pictures on Amazon. Hutch is attached by screws - got cracked a bit during assembly.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Well Designed with Easy Assembly (Great assembly instructions)
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the quality. This is not a cheap particle board desk like you'd find at some large stores. The instructions were extremely well written. Assembly took a couple of hours, but was not stressful or confusing. This is just a high quality desk with well constructed features. High quality instructions and looks great once assembled. (An no Allen wrench needed! Just a Phillips head screwdriver. Definitely a bonus.)
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It was exactly what I expected and wanted. I loved the way it was easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Gary R. Penner

customer_reviews.title: I love it. It's not difficult to put it together
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It's not difficult to put it together, it helps if you have an extra hand to help flip it.
customer_reviews.author: Lo Mei

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, but not easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: It looks wonderful and it is very sturdy when put together correctly. The only complaint from my husband is that it was difficult to put together. It took him two days to assemble it and he was frustrated. Nevertheless, it is wonderful and I'm glad we purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: LaToya

customer_reviews.title: not really strong if with extra assemble by your self
customer_reviews.text: the real material is MDF not wooden and the components offered was not enough and the assembling design let the frame not strong enough for moving
customer_reviews.author: Leo.chen

customer_reviews.title: great desk for my son
customer_reviews.text: great desk for my son. very comfortable. was easy to put together too. he enjoys sitting at his desk and doing his school work or playing on his computer.
customer_reviews.author: christine

customer_reviews.title: Awesome price and easily put together
customer_reviews.text: Had to downsize for the wife and she is loving it. Awesome price and easily put together.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Shepard

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid when I got the desk it was going to be nicked and scratched from shipping this heavy product. But it arrived with sufficient protection from what I mentioned. Put the unit together and it's beautiful. It was cheaper than Walmart and Meijer.mGo Amazon !
customer_reviews.author: Bart Badsing

customer_reviews.title: computer desk
customer_reviews.text: We had on piece damaged but they sent us another in a couple of days. It was an experience putting it together when we got it done it turned out nice.
customer_reviews.author: chuck

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: While I understand that this is not the most expensive desk that one could buy, I expected it to be somewhat stable and functional. I found that it is basically a cheap piece of crap. I followed the directions to put it together exactly as the manual said(a long, cumbersome process) and found it falling apart before I could even stand it up. Once a piece falls out, it won't go back in securely, therefore it ruins any chance of stability. I would not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Damaged during shipping, had to return
customer_reviews.text: I sent it back because it was damaged during shipping. Perhaps if you had better luck than I did the product would be great, but it did appear to be packed decently, so you would think the item would have held up better than that.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: so disappointed (see attached photos)
customer_reviews.text: Way, way darker than the advertising pictures show. I was hoping by looking at the pictures here on Amazon that it would match a wood chair I purchased too but no, so disappointed (see attached photos). The finish looks like that cheap Charlie dark finish you have been seeing on Sauder products for years. Other than being to dark and not matching anything in my house I like it. Took four hours to assemble
customer_reviews.author: G. wilhelm

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like this hutch matched my dining room very well so that is were we put the computer
customer_reviews.author: country

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit
customer_reviews.text: This desk looks expensive, takes some time to build, about an hour, is heavy & has nice wood color!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Sauder Harvest Mill Computer Desk with Hutch, Abbey Oak finish
product_meta.description: Create the perfect office/workspace in your home with this computer desk from the Harvest Mill collection. It features a flip-down molding that reveals a slide-out keyboard/mouse shelf and a storage area behind the door that accommodates a vertical CPU tower and includes an adjustable shelf. Its handy hutch features cubbyhole storage for additional storage space of office essentials and supplies. Finished in Abbey Oak, this classy desk will look the part while you get the job done.
feature_bullets: This computer desk with hutch features flip-down molding revealing a slide-out keyboard/mouse shelf with metal runners and safety stops
Storage area behind door features an adjustable shelf and holds a vertical CPU tower
Quick and easy assembly with patented slide-on moldings

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars202 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
